DeathSteel::

He walkedout of the maintenance bay and went to his quarters. He sat 
down at his comm console and opened a channel to Tyrael. "Commander. 
When it is convienent for you, I wish to speak with you.  I can be 
reached in my quarters,"  He left the message for his new leader and 
closed the channel.  He sat back and closed his optics. He smiled at 
the brewing thoughts in his mind.
